A4.text: the executive branch (the government) derives its legitimacy from and is accountable to the legislature (the parliament)

A5.text: Most have a clear differentiation between the head of government and the head of state, with the head of government holding real power and the head of state being a ceremonial position, similar to constitutional monarchies.
